Honey never goes bad.
Cats sleep for about 70% of their lives.
A goldfish can remember things for months.
Elephants are the only animals that can’t jump.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Bananas are actually berries.
The moon looks bigger when it’s near the horizon.
Sloths are so slow that algae can grow on them.
Butterflies taste with their feet.
Dolphins sleep with one eye open.
Sharks existed before dinosaurs.
There are more chickens than people on Earth.
An ant can carry things 50 times its own weight.
Cows have best friends.
The world’s biggest pizza was over a mile wide.
You can’t hum while holding your nose.
Koalas sleep up to 22 hours a day.
Giraffes only need 5 minutes of sleep at a time.
A group of jellyfish is called a smack.
The fastest bird is the peregrine falcon.
Penguins can’t fly, but they can swim fast.
A baby kangaroo is the size of a jellybean when born.
Hot water can freeze faster than cold water.
Some frogs can freeze and still be alive.
The longest word in English has 189,819 letters.
A sneeze can travel up to 100 miles per hour.
Clouds are really heavy, but they float.
Pineapples take two years to grow.
Snow isn’t white; it’s actually clear.
Your heartbeat syncs with the music you listen to.
